entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.6°C

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
